verses.verse: Then Job <S%H347><s%> answered, <S%H6030><s%>
"I have heard <S%H8085><s%> many such things. <S%H7227><s%> You are all miserable <S%H5999><s%> comforters! <S%H5162><s%>
Shall vain <S%H7307><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> have an end? <S%H7093><s%> Or what provokes <S%H4834><s%> you that you answer? <S%H6030><s%>

I also could speak <S%H1696><s%> as you do. <S%H3863><s%> If your soul <S%H5315><s%> were <S%H3426><s%> in my soul <S%H5315><s%>'s place, <S%H2266><s%> I could join words <S%H4405><s%> together against you, <S%H5128><s%> and shake my head <S%H7218><s%> at you, <S%H1119><s%>
but I would strengthen <S%H553><s%> you with <S%H1119><s%> my mouth. <S%H6310><s%> The solace <S%H5205><s%> of my lips <S%H8193><s%> would relieve you. <S%H2820><s%>
"Though I speak, <S%H1696><s%> my grief <S%H3511><s%> is not subsided. <S%H2820><s%> Though I forbear, <S%H2308><s%> what am I eased? <S%H1980><s%>
But now, <S%H3811><s%> God, you have surely worn me out. <S%H8074><s%> You have made desolate all my company. <S%H5712><s%>
You have shriveled <S%H7059><s%> me up. <S%H5707><s%> This is a witness against me. <S%H3585><s%> My leanness rises up <S%H6965><s%> against me. <S%H6030><s%> It testifies to my face. <S%H6440><s%>

He has torn <S%H2963><s%> me in his wrath, <S%H639><s%> and persecuted <S%H7852><s%> me. <S%H2786><s%> He has gnashed on me with his teeth. <S%H8127><s%> My adversary <S%H6862><s%> sharpens <S%H3913><s%> his eyes on me. <S%H5869><s%>

They have gaped <S%H6473><s%> on me with their mouth. <S%H6310><s%> They have struck <S%H5221><s%> me on the cheek <S%H3895><s%> reproachfully. <S%H2781><s%> They gather <S%H4390><s%> themselves together against me. <S%H3162><s%>
God <S%H410><s%> delivers <S%H5462><s%> me to the ungodly, <S%H5760><s%> and casts me into <S%H3399><s%> the hands <S%H3027><s%> of the wicked. <S%H7563><s%>

I was at ease, <S%H7961><s%> and he broke me apart. <S%H6565><s%> Yes, <S%H270><s%> he has taken me by the neck, <S%H6203><s%> and dashed me to pieces. <S%H6327><s%> He has also set me up <S%H6965><s%> for his target. <S%H4307><s%>

His archers <S%H7228><s%> surround <S%H5437><s%> me. <S%H6398><s%> He splits my kidneys <S%H3629><s%> apart, <S%H6398><s%> and does not spare. <S%H2550><s%> He pours out <S%H8210><s%> my gall <S%H4845><s%> on the ground. <S%H776><s%>
He breaks <S%H6555><s%> me with breach <S%H6556><s%> on <S%H6440><s%> breach. <S%H6556><s%> He runs <S%H7323><s%> on me like a giant. <S%H1368><s%>
I have sewed <S%H8609><s%> sackcloth <S%H8242><s%> on my skin, <S%H1539><s%> and have thrust <S%H5953><s%> my horn <S%H7161><s%> in the dust. <S%H6083><s%>
My face <S%H6440><s%> is red <S%H2560><s%> with weeping. <S%H1065><s%> Deep darkness <S%H6757><s%> is on my eyelids. <S%H6079><s%>
Although there is no violence <S%H2555><s%> in my hands, <S%H3709><s%> and my prayer <S%H8605><s%> is pure. <S%H2134><s%>
"Earth, <S%H776><s%> don't <S%H3680><s%> cover my blood. <S%H1818><s%> Let my cry <S%H2201><s%> have no place to rest. <S%H4725><s%>
Even now, <S%H5707><s%> behold, my witness is in heaven. <S%H8064><s%> He who vouches <S%H7717><s%> for me is on high. <S%H4791><s%>
My friends <S%H7453><s%> scoff <S%H3887><s%> at me. <S%H5869><s%> My eyes pour out <S%H1811><s%> tears to God, <S%H433><s%>
that he would maintain <S%H3198><s%> the right of a man <S%H1397><s%> with God, <S%H433><s%> of a son of man <S%H120><s%> with his neighbor! <S%H1121><s%>
For when a few <S%H4557><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> have come, <S%H857><s%> I shall go <S%H857><s%> the way <S%H734><s%> of no return. <S%H7725><s%>
